task.title: Adding a community manually
task.shortdesc: Selecting Add Manually, the Add Communities screen displays.

dlentry.dd: The display name that you use for this community.
The server host URL. Provide the fully qualified Sametime server host name or IP address.
The server port number. The default port number is 443.

step.cmd: Expand Advanced Properties for additional properties required by some connection.

plentry.pd: Indicates if a secure HTTPS connection is to be used.

Specify if an authentication proxy is to be used. The default value is for a direct connection to be used. However, if your host server is behind a firewall, you may need to use an authenticating proxy. Selecting Authentication Proxy requires credentials used to authenticate with the proxy. Contact your administrator for details.

step.info: You can save your password for future logins by turning on Remember Password.

step.cmd: Tap Save Yes to store your information.

step.info: The log in page displays. Enter your password and select your status. Click Log In to access the chat community.
